location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to Bazett Doveton, Military Accountant, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the Subadar (chief officer) of the new Residency Guard who was being charged more for his provisions than his predecessor, and requesting confirmation that the charge had been made in error and that the difference could therefore be paid back to him.
